title: Blossom of Brilliance: Diamond-studded Kada/Kankanam
materials: G-H Color). Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: A modern take on the traditional Kada, this piece features a striking floral motif at the center, flanked by geometric square designs. Each design element is meticulously set with shimmering diamonds. The band is gracefully curved for a comfortable fit. Features high-end pave setting.
colors: Rose Gold and Dazzling White Diamonds
occasions: or a special occasion. Its elegant design makes it suitable for both traditional and modern outfits.
description: This diamond Kada represents a harmonious blend of modern design and timeless elegance. The high-quality diamonds ensure maximum sparkle, while the Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of local craftsmanship, guaranteeing durability and long-lasting shine. It is the perfect statement piece for the modern woman who appreciates fine jewelry with a unique design.
